articles.title: How to Integrate AI into Your Home Security

The API offers building blocks for developers to create agents capable of searching the web, digging through files, and performing tasks on a computer on a user's behalf. OpenAI is planning to replace its Assistants API with the new API in mid-2026.

For consumers, it will mean you'll soon be interacting with AI that's faster, more fluid in using forms of media other than text and capable of taking more steps on your behalf.

Google's average search click-through rate was 8.63%, but the CTR for AI search engines was 0.74% and 0.33% for AI chatbots. AI search sends 91% fewer referrals and chatbots send 96% less than traditional search.

articles.title: Laughter boosts legitimacy: How humor makes scientists more likable and credible
articles.author: Studyfinds Staff
articles.summary: Scientists who use humor effectively are perceived as more credible sources of scientific information. Humor can make scientific content more engaging and shareable, helping scientists connect with broader audiences and counter misinformation. Scientists worry that using humor could undermine their authority or make them seem unprofessional. Well-executed humor must fit the context and be skillfully delivered.

articles.title: AI vs. AI: 6 ways enterprises are automating cybersecurity to counter AI-powered attacks
articles.summary: Every day, malicious actors are using artificial intelligence to widen the scope and speed of their attack methods.
